Poll questions, if the forum permits and gives me the proper guidance.

post_info.post_title: When Were You First in Existence?

My life can be linked to the first existence of life on this planet, we all have a long, long lineage of DNA threads.

Would you say then that you exist forever through your descendents?
 
 I vote for conception but I am not saying you are wrong. I view the question different to you.
 
 Edit: The tone of the questions leads me to think that this would be better placed in the philosophy section.
 
 Edit 2: Case in point, when did this thread first begin? Was it with your first, second or third attempt? emoticon_smile

Edit 2: Case in point, when did this thread first begin? Was it with your first, second or third attempt? emoticon_smile

 
 That's silly, Beef.... it should be perfectly clear for everyone to see that this thread actually began when Simone's life did.... Billions upon Billions of years ago. (in earth time that is)
 
 :::sigh:::
 
 Thanks for helping illustrate the desperate lunacy of just that sort of rhetoric.

Would you say then that you exist forever through your descendents?
 
 I vote for conception but I am not saying you are wrong. I view the question different to you.
 
 Edit: The tone of the questions leads me to think that this would be better placed in the philosophy section.
 
 Edit 2: Case in point, when did this thread first begin? Was it with your first, second or third attempt? emoticon_smile

 Yes, I will, in a certain sense.
 
 I have observed traits of my ancestors in my children. Therefore, if I have descendants in a long line, part of me will exist as long as that line continues.
 
 But, it's not really important to me to exist forever. If I pass on any of my traits, I hope they are good traits.
It took me three attempts to figure out how to create a thread with a poll. Obviously, my ancestors were not handy with computer strategies.

Simone, you are missing a lot of options that a large chunk of the pro-choice camp would choose. Namely, I view myself as beginning at the beginning of my mental existence - around the start of the third trimester. Many others hold similar views. Your latest choice is conception, which I cannot agree to. So, that leaves me with no way of answering your poll. Did you mean this to be a joke poll? If not, then, please, be more inclusive next time.

Thanks! I thought there might be more options but I had such a problem creating the poll I had to solve that problem first.
 
 You raise a valid point.

simone,
 
 I agree with A-O.
 
 For me, my existence began at my birth.
 
 That should have been included.

All that the foregoing answers show is that this is a metaphysical question with no "right" answer except the one which satisfies each one of us individually.
 
 Therefore, no one has the right to force her/his view on anyone else.

All that the foregoing answers show is that this is a metaphysical question with no "right" answer except the one which satisfies each one of us individually.
 
 Therefore, no one has the right to force her/his view on anyone else.

 
 Your conclusion doesn't follow. People having different answers doesn't mean one isn't right or that one can't be made law.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  When Were You First in Existence?
